title: Tony Greig stood by Sri Lanka, says Arjuna Ranatunga
content: “Not only was he a great admirer of Sri Lanka cricket, he also loved our country,” Ranatunga said, adding cricket world would be poorer without Greig, Colombo: Remembering Tony Greig, who passed away after losing his battle with lung cancer, Sri Lanka’s World Cup winning skipper Arjuna Ranatunga said that former England captain and celebrated…
